name: awa
description: Applies a waterfall-like pixel sorting effect based on lightness to create dynamic visual distortions.

threshold_min.description: Controls the minimum pixel brightness for sorting.

threshold_max.description: Controls the maximum pixel brightness for sorting.

sorting_direction.description: Sets the sorting direction: 0 for vertical, 1 for horizontal.

sorting_style.description: Sort based on: 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Controls the minimum pixel brightness for sorting.
